description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve issues with Windows Update on devices where version 21H2 has reached the end of updates:

1. Upgrade the operating system to the next version (e.g., 22H2) which supersedes all previous Windows Update files.
2. Follow the installation prompts to complete the upgrade process.

**Details**:
- This upgrade will replace any outdated Windows Update files, potentially resolving persistent update issues.
- Ensure to test the upgrade on a non-critical system before pushing it to production environments to evaluate potential impacts.
